titles.title: A resolution recognizing the benefits of breastfeeding, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/16/2006--Introduced. Recognizes the health, economic, and social benefits of breastfeeding. Urges states to take steps to: (1) protect a mother's right to breastfeed; and (2) remove the barriers faced by women who breastfeed.
